title: Zelensky says Biden ‘looked on from a distance’ as Russia invaded Ukraine
content:
1. Zelensky says Biden ‘looked on from a distance’ as Russia invaded Ukraine  The Independent
  2. Ukraine president vows to stay put as Russian troops approach  Reuters
  3. Ukraine president throws shade at Biden over US absence: 'Watching from afar'  Fox News
  4. Zelenskyy: 'New Iron Curtain' Separates Russia From 'Civilized World'  NBC News
  5. Ukrainian president announces general mobilization  Business Insider
  6. View Full Coverage on Google News

localize.title: ロシアがウクライナに侵攻したとき、バイデンは「遠くから見ていた」とゼレンスキーは言う。
泽伦斯基说拜登在俄罗斯入侵乌克兰时 "远远地看着"。
澤倫斯基說拜登在俄羅斯入侵烏克蘭時 "遠遠地看着"。
